thread.title: 17 Little Details You Like, Totally Never Noticed In "Legally Blonde"
thread.title_full: 17 Little Details You Like, Totally Never Noticed In "Legally Blonde"

author: Sam Stryker
title: 17 Little Details You Like, Totally Never Noticed In "Legally Blonde"
text:
View this image › 
MGM It’s the little things.
ID: 10650108 2. Delta Nu is actually a real sorority that exists at Dickinson College , but it’s a non-national chapter . View this image › 
MGM Sign us up!
ID: 10649233 3. Elle attends California University, Los Angeles, which seems like it’s based on UCLA. View this image › 
MGM Go Bruins?
ID: 10649242 4. It looks like Warner orders champagne and proposes a toast to dump Elle, before they’re even served dinner. Kind of douchey! View this image › 
MGM Like, who does that?
ID: 10649307 5. Elle has a cootie catcher on her desk next to her framed photo of Warner. View this image › 
MGM I wonder what she has written in it!
ID: 10649337 6. Elle’s 179 (out of 180) on the LSAT is actually INSANE — it places her roughly in the 99.94% percentile of people who took the exam. View this image › 
MGM See you in court!
ID: 10649409 7. Oh, and can we just take a moment to look at the faces on the Harvard Law admissions officers when they’re watching Elle’s video? View this image › 
MGM Now THAT is how you do an admissions essay.
ID: 10649424 8. If you pay close attention, Bruiser always has amazing outfits throughout the movie, but his best might be the Harvard sweater he’s sporting when Elle first drives to campus. View this image › 
MGM Nice duds.
ID: 10650158 9. Oh, and Elle’s vanity license plate on her Porsche is “22BLONDE.” View this image › 
MGM Because of course.
ID: 10650161 10. When the students are going around in a circle introducing themselves during orientation, there’s this random sixth dude in Elle’s group — but he never speaks. View this image › 
MGM Who is he?
ID: 10649459 11. Kenya Moore — yup, THAT Kenya from The Real Housewives of Atlanta — is on the cover of the magazine Paulette is reading when she first meets Elle. View this image › 
MGM Kenya was an actress before she joined the cast of the Bravo show.
ID: 10649623 12. For someone who got a 179 on her LSAT, it’s kind of strange that Elle didn’t purchase a laptop until the end of October/beginning of November in her first semester at law school. View this image › 
MGM That would be about 2-3 months into her law school career, since we know the costume party is around Halloween.
ID: 10650116 13. Bruiser is barking at the Taco Bell chihuahua, which foreshadows Legally Blonde 2: Red, White, and Blonde . View this image › 
MGM Elle finds out Bruiser is gay in the sequel. Puppy love.
ID: 10650148 14. All of the faces during the “bend and snap” scene are pretty priceless, but the best might be this older woman in the background. View this image › 
MGM She is all of us learning the bend and snap.
ID: 10649846 15. Raquel Welch features as Windham’s ex-wife, and she takes the stand against workout guru Brooke — which is ironic, because in real life, Welch had her own line of beauty/fitness books and videos. View this image › 
MGM What a twist of fate.
ID: 10649921 16. Elle’s outfits progress to be more and more understated throughout her time at law school, but she switches back to pink in the final courtroom scene — and of course, she promptly nails Chutney (and her perm) on the stand. MGM
MGM
  She went back to basics, and it paid off.
ID: 10650899 17. “Perfect Day” by Hoku plays during the first and last scene of the movie, which actually kind of makes PERFECT sense. In the first scene, Elle thinks she’s going to have the perfect day, only to have it ruined. At the end of the movie, her graduation is her ACTUAL perfect day. MGM
MGM
  What a perfect ending.
ID: 10650095 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com! 
  More News About Reese Witherspoon
